description.title: Ceiling as a Thermal Boundary
description.tagline: Comparing Heat Flow in a Room With or Without a Ceiling
description.content:
In building science, the border heat can flow to easily is called thermal boundary or thermal envelope. 
It may differ from the shape of the house. 
With this model, you can investigate if the ceiling is a thermal boundary. 
To remove the ceiling, simply click on it and then press the DELETE key.
